provisions.title: Transitional provisions
provisions.content: A port, warehouse, transit shed, sufferance wharves or boarding station or any other place designated by the Commissioner-General for the loading, unloading and storage of goods approved immediately before the commencement of this Act shall continue to be approved, and all duly appointed wharves shall be deemed to be approved places of loading and unloading until their appointment is revoked or varied under this Act.
